attributes.action: Vote for the freedom of Palestine, in Parliament
attributes.background: Many Palestinians are being persecuted unlawfully everyday, because of the illegal occupation by the Israelis. Remember Palestine today, tomorrow, and forever.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on Parliament to vote to recognise Palestine as a sovereign state.
